de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.adhoc.socialize

Interface I_SocialMediaClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FacebookClient, TwitterClient

    public interface I_SocialMediaClient
    An interface for social media clients that allow posting of short messages and URLs

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isConnected()
      Checks if the client is connected
      boolean publishOffer(URL permalink, Long offerId)
      Publish an offer
      boolean reconnect()
      Reconnect the client.
      boolean send(URL url, String message)
      Send a message

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Checks if the client is connected
        Returns:
        true, if is connected

      • publishOffer

        boolean publishOffer(URL permalink,
                   Long offerId)
        Publish an offer
        Parameters:
        permalink - a permalink to the frontend-view of the offer
        offerId - the offer ID
        Returns:
        true, if successfully published, false otherwise

      • reconnect

        boolean reconnect()
        Reconnect the client. Important: The client may need to re-read its configuration, as this method will be called on reconfiguration.
        Returns:
        true, if successful, false otherwise

      • send

        boolean send(URL url,
           String message)
        Send a message
        Parameters:
        url - Any URL for further information about the message
        message - the message itself
        Returns:
        true, if successful, false otherwise
